/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, stretches out into the distance, flanked by towering buildings on one side and verdant trees on the other. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the clear blue sky. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, the sunlight casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, emphasizing the vastness of the cityscape.
